comment: Two ways of expressing the statement "there is a cover of ` A ` by elements of ` B ` such that for each set in the cover, ` ph ` ". Note that ` ph ` and ` x ` must be distinct. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 21-Jun-2010.)
